creator: AlgoCrunch, Inc
descriptionHtml:
Get your paper and markers out, and get ready to DRAW, SNAP, PLAY!

* This application is free to download and play games. A purchase is required to create games.
* Internet connectivity required to play. Data charges may apply.
* Pixicade requires use of the camera, children under 13 require parent permission to play.
descriptionShort: Get your paper and markers out, and get ready to DRAW, SNAP, PLAY!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Added new Adventure mode, featuring 72 great games!
* Added new Offline mode, play the Adventure even if you don't have internet!
* Streamlined "Friends" to "Followers" and "Following", now you can easily follow your favorite creators to see their games!
* Improved QR code scanning reliability & messages
* Improved performance going back home after playing a game
* Added a new Following Feed on the home screen!
* Added additional privacy settings
* Added additional FAQ's for support

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Teachers love Pixicade, and we love them back! This update introduces brand new features for educators in the classroom!
* Educational accounts - locked down environments where visible games are only from users in your institution
* Course, Lesson and User management features (only available for educator accounts)
* Conversations feature enables messaging between students and teachers (only available for educator accounts)

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
**** Get ready for Pixicade's biggest update yet! ****
* Stickers
* More rewards
* Game backgrounds
* Game music
* Text effects
* Preview screen
* Arcade filtering
* Picture cropping

**** Now Introducing Pixicade Extra! ****
* Quest game type and Powerups!
* Bumper Run!
* Multi-page games!
* New game types or powerups added each month!
* Animated avatars!
* More game borders, backgrounds and music!
* Monthly subscription required

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Now introducing Assets! Draw in full color on paper, snap a photo and select how you want your drawing to behave. Drag your assets into any game that you create! Use them over and over again!

New Textures powerup! This gives you an easy way to change your single color drawing into something more exciting!

Full color game icons!

8 New Leaderboards!

Reduced game creation processing time!

Updated Home Screen

Miscellaneous bug fixes

descriptionShort: Get your paper and markers out, and get ready to DRAW, SNAP, PLAY!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Get ready for one of Pixicade's biggest updates yet! We've added 2 new epic features for you to explore!

* Introducing Pixicade Sparks! Add animated, interactive characters such as dragons, aliens, dolphins and much more to your games!
* Now there's a whole new way to play with Race Mode! Race against other players or party up with your friends to compete for the fastest time. Rank up and earn rewards! Do you have what it takes to become a Super Star?
* Miscellaneous bug fixes and improvements

title:
Pixicade
3.5.12

creator: BitOGenius Inc
descriptionHtml:
Pixicade is the ultimate mobile game maker! Unleash your creativity and join a community of over half-a-million game creators!

CREATE
- Create your own video games from hundreds of full color assets!
- Snap a picture and turn your drawings into playable video games!
- Enhance your games with exciting cosmetics like game borders, backgrounds, music, and more!
- Level-up your creations by adding Powerups to make the game of your dreams!

SHARE
- Share your games with other Pixicade creators all over the world!
- Follow your favorite creators and build an audience of your own!
- Track your progress as a Pixicade creator and player through leaderboards!

PLAY
- Be inspired - play games made by other Pixicade creators in the Pixicade Arcade!
- Looking for a challenge? Race against other players to compete for the fastest times and earn awesome rewards!
- Explore epic multi-level Quests full of interesting characters, stories, and bosses!


* This application is free to download and play games. An optional subscription is available to enhance your experience.
* Internet connectivity required to play. Data charges may apply.
* Children under 13 may require parent permission to play.
descriptionShort: Get your paper and markers out, and get ready to DRAW, SNAP, PLAY!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Get ready for one of Pixicade's BIGGEST updates yet!
* Shop featuring tons of amazing items! Check back each week for new selections!
* Create levels using premade assets to jump start your creations!
* Try premium features such as game types, Powerups, and Sparks!
* New mission rewards track featuring dozens of new exclusive items!
* Daily log-in rewards
* New in-depth tutorial for new users
* Tons of bug fixes and performance improvements

title:
Pixicade
4.0.11

creator: BitOGenius Inc
descriptionHtml:
Pixicade is the ultimate mobile game maker! Unleash your creativity and join a community of over half-a-million game creators!

CREATE
- Create your own video games from hundreds of full color assets!
- Snap a picture and turn your drawings into playable video games!
- Enhance your games with exciting cosmetics like game borders, backgrounds, music, and more!
- Level-up your creations by adding Powerups to make the game of your dreams!

SHARE
- Share your games with other Pixicade creators all over the world!
- Follow your favorite creators and build an audience of your own!
- Track your progress as a Pixicade creator and player through leaderboards!

PLAY
- Be inspired - play games made by other Pixicade creators in the Pixicade Arcade!
- Looking for a challenge? Race against other players to compete for the fastest times and earn awesome rewards!
- Explore epic multi-level Quests full of interesting characters, stories, and bosses!


* This application is free to download and play games. An optional subscription is available to enhance your experience.
* Internet connectivity required to play. Data charges may apply.
* Children under 13 may require parent permission to play.
descriptionShort: Get your paper and markers out, and get ready to DRAW, SNAP, PLAY!

title:
Pixicade
4.0.31

creator: BitOGenius Inc
descriptionHtml:
BUILD your game from scratch with no coding needed. Browse a library with tons of pre-made assets, or snap a picture and turn your drawings into playable video games!
PLAY the games you make, or get inspiration playing games from other creators in the Pixicade Arcade!
SHARE your games with friends and other creators and build an audience of your own!

Pixicade lets you channel your inner game developer.

PIXICADE - FEATURES
--------------------------------
• Create your very own games with no coding needed!
• Browse a library filled with pre-made, full color assets!
• Kid safe & COPPA compliant
• Snap a picture and add your own drawings into your games!
• Add exciting cosmetics like game borders, backgrounds, music, and more!
• Level-up your creations by adding Powerups!
• Share your game with friends or the community of over half-a-million game creators!
• Follow your favorite creators & build an audience of your own!
• Track your progress as a top creator & player on the leaderboards!
• Play tons of games made by other creators - get inspired!
• Race against other players to compete for the fastest times and earn awesome rewards!
• Explore epic multi-level Quests full of interesting characters, stories, and bosses!
• Add friends to see when they’re online & playing!
• Chat with friends, or in group chats!
• Vote for and receive your favorite assets from others in weekly asset making challenges!
• Refer friends to earn special rewards!


BUILD
Creating games in Pixicade is easy. Just choose the type of game you want to make, and start creating!
Pick from a variety of game types like platformers, slingshot games, brickbreakers, mazes and more.
Add walls, obstacles, hazards, powerups & objectives to your games as well as cosmetics like borders, backgrounds and music. Browse a huge library of full color premade assets, or draw your own and upload them with your camera!

PLAY
Play the games you create, or browse the arcade to see what other creators have made. See what types of games are popular, and get inspiration for your next masterpiece!
Compete against other players in races for the fastest times to win rewards. Or, try quest mode to progress through multiple levels filled with interesting characters, stories, and bosses!

SHARE
Once you’re done making your games, share them with friends and the rest of the community!
Follow your favorite creators, and build an audience of your own! You can even track your score as both a player and a creator and get recognized on the leaderboards.

Want to try making your own games? Give Pixicade a try for free!

This application is free to download and play games. An optional subscription is available to enhance your experience. You can manage your subscription, including cancelling it, via Google Play's Subscription Center here:
https://myaccount.google.com/payments-and-subscriptions
* Internet connectivity required to play. Data charges may apply.
* Children under 13 may require parent permission to play.
descriptionShort: Make your own video games!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Added new deluxe powerup for August: Icy!
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Browse a library filled with pre-made, full color assets!
• Kid safe & COPPA compliant
• Snap a picture and add your own drawings into your games!
• Add exciting cosmetics like game borders, backgrounds, music, and more!
• Level-up your creations by adding Powerups!
• Share your game with friends or the community of over half-a-million game creators!
• Follow your favorite creators & build an audience of your own!
• Track your progress as a top creator & player on the leaderboards!
• Play tons of games made by other creators - get inspired!
• Race against other players to compete for the fastest times and earn awesome rewards!
• Explore epic multi-level Quests full of interesting characters, stories, and bosses!
• Add friends to see when they’re online & playing!
• Chat with friends, or in group chats!
• Vote for and receive your favorite assets from others in weekly asset making challenges!
• Refer friends to earn special rewards!


BUILD
Creating games in Pixicade is easy. Just choose the type of game you want to make, and start creating!
Pick from a variety of game types like platformers, slingshot games, brickbreakers, mazes and more.
Add walls, obstacles, hazards, powerups & objectives to your games as well as cosmetics like borders, backgrounds and music. Browse a huge library of full color premade assets, or draw your own and upload them with your camera!

PLAY
Play the games you create, or browse the arcade to see what other creators have made. See what types of games are popular, and get inspiration for your next masterpiece!
Compete against other players in races for the fastest times to win rewards. Or, try quest mode to progress through multiple levels filled with interesting characters, stories, and bosses!

SHARE
Once you’re done making your games, share them with friends and the rest of the community!
Follow your favorite creators, and build an audience of your own! You can even track your score as both a player and a creator and get recognized on the leaderboards.

Want to try making your own games? Give Pixicade a try for free!

This application is free to download and play games. An optional subscription is available to enhance your experience. You can manage your subscription, including cancelling it, via Google Play's Subscription Center here:
https://myaccount.google.com/payments-and-subscriptions
* Internet connectivity required to play. Data charges may apply.
* Children under 13 may require parent permission to play.
descriptionShort: Make your own video games!
